website_summaries.verdict: Cute sandals that look cool and support your feet at the same time.
pros: Multiple straps offer lots of adjustability for a comfortable fit
Received the APMA Seal of Acceptance
Synthetic or natural cork upper with stone adornments
Hook-and-loop closures at heel, instep, forefoot, and toe
cons: Hook-and-loop material may detach from straps

customer_reviews.title: I usually like Vionic brand because of the wonderful arch support
customer_reviews.text: I usually like Vionic brand because of the wonderful arch support. The problem was with this particular style was the Velcro. VERY poorly glued on and separated from several of the straps. Walking around Spain with these for 2 weeks and that was the end of them. They were new for the trip--had only worn a few times to break them in. I threw them out before getting on the plane to return home. We had to find a sewing kit to try to tack down the Velcro on the straps so they were temporarily useable. Too late to return the sandals but I will not buy any sandals from this company again with Velcro strap closure.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Variable sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Vionic shoes are so hard to fit. Sometimes I take a 7, sometimes an 8. I normally wear an 8. in "regular" shoes. After I ordered these I went to Dillards to see what was available locally. I tried these same shoes on in an 8 and a 7 and the 7 fit perfectly so when these came from Amazon, I sent them back. I tried on another pair of sandals in 7 and they were too small and the 8 fit in the foot bed but the straps over my feet stood up at least a 1/4" above my foot. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL TO FEEL GOOD
customer_reviews.text: These feel great on my feet. I had surgery for plantar fascitis and was told by my orthopedic physician to purchase orthaheel or vionic shoes for the best confort. So, I replenished my shoe collection with a few pair of sandals and a few pair of sneakers and I am not having any pain!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MOMMOM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fully adjustable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I really love these sandals! They are fully adjustable and the built in orthotic gives me the support I needed. They were easy for me to wear right from the start, as I’m already used to wearing orthotics. I suggest breaking them in as recommended before wearing them full time.
customer_reviews.author: zuzu

customer_reviews.title: Walked Spain for 2 weeks in Vionic Women's Amber Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have been recovering from Achilles Tendinitis and had been desperately trying to find footware that would help heal or at least not aggravate the condition. These sandals are fantastic! After two days, the pain in my Achilles Tendon was about 80% less. I wear them all the time, including walking all over Spain in September. As a result, I purchased two pairs of mules and a pair of gym shoes from Vionic for myself and three pairs of Vionic men's shoes for my hubby who has knee problems and Plantar's Fasciitis. The shoes didn't do much for his knee problem, but he is SUPER happy with the relief they shoes provide for his Plantar's Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Princess RS

customer_reviews.title: Orthaheels
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar facitius these shoes have amazingly changed my life. I will definite order more. Before the purchase I could bRely walk after sitting. Now I am able to stand without any pain. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Sha

customer_reviews.title: long
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and wprms beautifully. Gives me the support I desperately needed in my arches. They are a bit long though, it extends past where it should.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Basnight

customer_reviews.title: Can't walk without them!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a retired dancer and now enjoy walking. Unfortunately, with different injuries I've sustained through life-long dancing, I'm limited to only walking in sandals. These have been amazing. I walked 39.3 miles last year in the Avon Walk to End Breast Cancer, and am gearing up for another 39.3 mile walk. I couldn't have done it without these sandals. They support great and I love that you can customize the fit with the different velcro straps. I have turned many walkers on to these great sandals. Many comments when I walk about how nice they look, too! The fit is great. I'm a 7 1/2 - 8 and the 8 fits great. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: the support is great and I have not had any discomfort with any ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn anything but Vionic Orthaheel for a while, the support is great and I have not had any discomfort with any of them. This is my second pair of (identical) sandals. I wish there were more styles in sandals that are not thongs. I did order a size smaller than closed in shoes, and they fit perfectly. I don't know if they run large, or whether I just like extra toe room in regular styles.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in SC

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, nice style, helps my feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just slightly larger than the usual size 10 I get, but not enough that I had to send them back. All the straps have Velcro and are adjustable so that the shoe fits snug enough. Wearing them 2 days was enough that the heel of my foot stopped hurting. For me these shoes work great and I love the style.
customer_reviews.author: Toni's takes

customer_reviews.title: Good fit stinky result
customer_reviews.text: I like to these sandals they are really cute. They're supportive any areas on my foot that needs to be supported. However, there is a problem with wearing the sandals the insoles smell like stinky foot. The odor is like tothat of someone who has not been wearing socks inside of their sneakers for weeks or months. I have had these sandals for a matter of a couple of weeks. They're sandals so they are intended to be worn with out socks. I am disappointed since these sandals cost nearly $100 and they stink. In my accompanying photo, you will see white and they look worn. I've washed the insoles and latersptayed foot deodorant. That has helped a little.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Ranck

customer_reviews.title: Sad they dont make that style anymore
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me say these were not WW. The box and shoe say W. It's not a problem at the top of the shoe because the Velcro straps adjust enough. It is a problem on the foot bed. They shouldn't say WW if they are just W. I have a high arch and very swollen feet and instep. The arch area is a little too hard for me, but then I am used to tennis shoes and a pair of Crocs that finally fell apart. Sad they dont make that style anymore. This was my next option. The straps feel a little too stiff for my liking. They might not be real leather.
customer_reviews.author: M. Solis

customer_reviews.title: Still Comfy After All Summer Wear
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this sandal every day for three months, and it is Exactly the sandal I needed: looks nice with anything (dresses, shorts, jeans), amazing support, and no aching feet or legs all summer even during long days of walking around most of the day. Now that it's cold outside, I'm calling these my "slipper sandals", and I shall wear them indoors all winter. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the three adjustable straps. Have very high arch and a lot of shoes hit right on the bone. The center strap can be pushed slightly off center and not press on the it at all. Great arch support. I wear a 9 1/2 and ordered the 9. Fits very well. Good price. Did I forget to mention it's pretty too?
customer_reviews.author: BigFan In MO.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Vionic
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Having foot surgery March 8th this is what the dr wanted me to wear. However I am not sure how to get a replacement or money back becasue the shoe is peeling after only a couple of months. I do think spening this much on a sandle it should hold up better. I do have to wear most ever day. Great news Vionic stands behind their shoes! New pair and so glad
customer_reviews.author: Clara J.

customer_reviews.title: I am keeping this
customer_reviews.text: I have small heels and wide forefoot so it's hard to find shoes that are comfortable. I am keeping this one. I like the cushion. I like the support. My forefoot area is adjustable with the straps. I haven't done a lot of walking with it yet. I used it for a party of 4 hours standing around, sitting, very comfortable. It's cute and the shiny accents make it appropriate for a party. I usually wear size 6 wide in other brands. I tried it and it was too long. I got the 5 wide and it's great. I bought another one like this, and keeping both.
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: I like these so much this is my 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are so comfortable! I found them in a store while looking for sandals for my wide foot. The straps are fully adjustable giving plenty of room. Also, the heel cup and the extra arch support feels so good and aligns my foot properly. I can stay on my feet for hours now. This is my second pair because I wear them so often. I recommend these sandals for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: EsTe

customer_reviews.title: Did not work...
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried this brand before, but these sandals were a half size bigger and wider than I expected. The straps were a bit scratchy and not all that comfortable even though they're adjustable. They also have a more mature look than I was hoping for. The quality seems good, but the fit, comfort, and style weren't right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals on Amazon after trying them on at Dillard. I love that all straps can be adjusted to YOUR needs (i.e. width of foot and ankle). The sole cradles my foot perfectly. The shoe is for the most part very comfortable. I have to say most part since my feet often swell up which make many shoes uncomfortable. In this case, it has nothing to do with the quality of these sandals. Great product, especially the foot bed!
customer_reviews.author: Poppelfloh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality that doesn't hold up after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this pair of shoes and the return window is now closed. After just a few months of wearing, the Velcro strip is destroyed on one of the shoes and it doesn't stick in the right place, making the shoe unwearable and the strap always comes undone. Plus on the other side of where the back strap connects to the shoe it has become completely detached and will soon break off. I can't believe for how expensive these were that the quality was so bad. I would like to ask the vendor for a replacement pair of shoes please.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dossinger

customer_reviews.title: Vionics are life.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a whole size down in vionics because my feet are so flat the arch support makes them that much shorter. The support is fantastic. This particular style has been the most durable of the 10+ styles I've worn- the straps are thicker and each is adjustable. Although it isn't my favorite looking style, I keep coming back because of how much longer these seem to last. Never disappointed with vionics. Consistent sizing, quality, and not outrageous pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: i would have loved these sandals except i went by what the sizing ...
customer_reviews.text: i would have loved these sandals except i went by what the sizing chart showed. I measured twice maybe three times. I thought "no way" am i a size 5... but i ordered them anyway in a 5. I should have gone with my "gut feeling". as they were way to small for my feet. I would hope they change the sizing chart, because it is way off. Very deceiving. Check out both US and European sizing as well. I went back to order my correct size, but wouldnt you know it my size was gone with this beautiful cork style.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Siem

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Cork
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair, same color! I wear them a lot. The only thing I dislike about them, my insole stretched in one shoe after I cleaned them. Other than that, they are still very comfortable sandals. I have plantar fasciitis in both feet and Morton's Neuromz in the right. I've been sightseeing and shopping in DC, Costa Rica, TX, Ga, MS and wear them a lot when I'm home as well! I did purchase the black also. I will continue to purchase other colors and certainly recommend them to others!
customer_reviews.author: 504NolaLady

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look of the shoe but the material is quite roug and it doesn't offer as much support as I was led to believe in the write up and reviews. I'm a bit disappointed that a shoe that costs this much wouldn't be more comfortable and offer more support. I do expect more from this brand as ismts known for producing great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: lady29bug

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive enough
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good. The fit is a little big and that's saying a lot since I wear a size 12, I never find shoes too big. Sadly I couldn't give them anymore than three stars. There is not enough support in the arch. I was expecting them to be supportive like the flip flops and they definitely are not. They are also not good for a lot of walking or standing. For a cut pair of sandals, they work fine, but not for a supportive shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish Vionics were made out of real leather. ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish Vionics were made out of real leather. I think it would change the look a bit. These were a half size too big. I wear a 7.5. I bought a 7 and it's still a little big. I will probably repurchase these in a 6.5. Besides not being leather, the sizes seem to be all over the place. You really need to read reviews to know how to purchase the shoes. Thank Goodness for Amazon's return policies.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to wear these shoesandals. I disposed of box too soon and missed being able to return them. The right shoe was comfortable but on the left, my foot felt like it was sliding forward and off to the left after only a few steps, could not be adjusted in anyway to stop this. Also the footbed arch just felt off. My error is disposing of the box too soon, I thought it was just because my foot was hurting making me walk differently but that was not the issue. I will be leery about ordering Vionics again..
customer_reviews.author: Diane Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: I don't love these yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear to an upcoming trip to Italy, so I'm breaking them in now. Based on another pair of Vionic's I ordered one whole size down. I'm a solid 6 in most shoe brands, but a 5 in Vionic. I don't love these yet. I've never worn shoes that have the arch support, but I think I'll probably want these since we will be walking so much. I think they are decent looking, though my 26 year old thinks they look too mature for me. But, at this point I'm slightly (only slightly) more concerned about comfort, so I'm keeping them and breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: cutieshoes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit with arch support!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes ever!!! All straps are adjustable for a perfect fit. Made very well.The "cork gold metallic" lines are just enough to make the sandal "dressy" yet great casual wear. I have a high arch and these shoes support my arch completely, relieving my foot pain from non-support. LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Barb in MO

customer_reviews.title: Some days my feet hurt so much I couldn't walk ...
customer_reviews.text: Some days my feet hurt so much I couldn't walk very much....a friend suggested I try Vionic shoes as they had helped her with her foot pain. What a difference they made. I ordered a pair of sandals. In a few days the pain in my feet was almost gone. In a few weeks I was walking normally and going places I haven't been to because of the trouble I had with my feet. I ordered Vionic sneakers and more sandals. Wish I had known about Vionic shoes sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for those of us with Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: These sandals feel great on my feet and don't aggravate my plantar fasciitis. Loved them so much I bought several other pairs, in different colors and styles. Thanks Vionic. My feet once again are enjoying summertime and not being cooped up inside a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Egnew

customer_reviews.title: Major relief for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are saving my feet! Once I took the center piece off they were cuter than I thought. I wear them every day that I can! They saved my feet at Disney. Wore them 7 days straight with all that walking and had very little pain, even though i went to WDW in the midst of major plantar fasciitis and heal spurs. I wore a boot at night and these sandals every day. They run a little big, but all the Velcro strapping allows you to fit them properly. I have narrow feet so there's a decent amount of extra strap but it's not obvious to anyone but me. Definitely recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Tina V

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are very pretty. But, really for the price, super disappointed. I bought these because of the many reviews from folks suffering from Morton's Neuroma. For that, these are not horrible, but not great. The Velcro straps are scratchy on the tops of my feet. And no matter how many ways I try to adjust the right shoe, My foot sits in crooked...unless the itchy Velcro straps are a little cattywampus. To me, these fit like ill-designed cheap shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MrsVela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Except Material Touching Skin
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit of the shoe. There is tons of cushion and great arch support. It fit my wide feet nicely with plenty of room in the toes and the ability to adjust the straps with velcro. The style is pretty cute as well. But then I noticed the material against my skin. Unlike some of Vionic's other styles the material is man-made plastic type material so it will sweat and chafe in the heat. I was so disappointed because they were perfect otherwise. Found a great pair of SAS sandles that are like clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: breaking apart
customer_reviews.text: At first, these sandals looked and felt great, but within a few weeks, they started coming apart. The velcro strap detached and made these unwearable. Unless you are handy with sewing through thick material, you may want to pass.
customer_reviews.author: cshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this sandal & it is my first Vionic shoe. The podiatrist recommended this brand. What is great is that very little velcro shows on the straps! Typically, due to my wide foot, quite a bit of velcro shows besides picking up debri in its fibers. I was concerned about the nubs on the insole & it takes some getting used to - my feet are sensitive & it often feels like I have dirt in the sandal. Also the upper sandal portion on the upper foot isn't super soft or comfy, but the support of the shoe is pretty good. I wouldn't use them to walk all day though.
customer_reviews.author: cosu

customer_reviews.title: ... worn Vionic flip flops for a few years and love them. This is my first pair of sandals ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Vionic flip flops for a few years and love them. This is my first pair of sandals with a strap at the heel and nothing between my toes. I wear an 8 to 8 1/2 and the 8 fit perfect. They are comfortable to walk in. I will definitely buy another pair. Be advised if you are buying them for the first time the arch may take a bit to get used to. I have a high arch and these sandals give me the arch support I need. I love this brand of sandals and flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gullotto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: Not the fit I am used to with Vionic. There are velcro closures, but if you adjust too much, the velcro hits your foot - not confortable at all. Would not recommend. I have bought BareTraps at less than half the price and they are far superior to these. Probably will never purchase Vionic again. If you are looking for a comfortable Wide width shoe, these are not the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Stomp out plantar fasciitis pain
customer_reviews.text: My mom has struggled with plantar fasciitis for quite sometime. She’s a physical therapist and is on her feet a lot which exacerbates the pain. I purchased these sandals after she LOVED the vionic sneakers I got her. Fast forward a couple months and her pain has drastically decreased...in addition to consistently getting compliments on her shoe game.
customer_reviews.author: SamiSoFla

customer_reviews.title: I can walk without pain!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Vionic Rest Amber Backstrap sandals I have ordered: 1st pair in black, 2nd pair in gold cork, and now a 3rd pair in black again. I’d say these orthotic shoes provide good support for about 1-1.5 years. I didn’t realize just how much the old pair was worn down, so putting on these fresh, new ones was such a relief! I also recommend the Vionic Adilyn Women Round Toe Canvas Slipper for walking around the house without pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and great for lower back and low arches!
customer_reviews.text: A good fit and helps anyone w/ low or no natural arch support! Also noticed that it aided in allowing me to walk for longer periods w/ less lower back pain! A must have for anyone w/ L3-L5 back problems!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes have helped with my foot issues, the top ankle strap rubs against my ankle leaving a red mark. I've adjusted the straps multiple times but nothing seems to help. Unfortunately, I find myself not wanting to wear them as a result. Additionally, they do seem to run a little bit big.
customer_reviews.author: mahnj1772

customer_reviews.title: Velco straps won't stay closed, straps fall off foot and you step on them.
customer_reviews.text: Vionic usually makes an amazing shoe but these are very disappointing. The arch support is very minimal. Shoes might as well not have straps because they don't stay closed as the velcro doesn't stick. Straps fall of the back of your ankles and you end up stepping on them so you really have a strapless shoe. These are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Weird arch in these sandals
customer_reviews.text: The style is so nice but they don’t work for me. I tried two different pairs of these thinking the first pair was a one-off with an odd arch support. Sadly, the same issue was present in the second pair. I’ve bought four other styles of this brand in the past and they were all great but not this style. The left sandal fits and supports fine. However, for me on the right instead of arch support it feels like there is a raised bar-like area going across my foot. It is not aligned with my arch and is uncomfortable. I’ve returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stover

customer_reviews.title: Feet slip around
customer_reviews.text: Can't tighten them enough, my foot keeps twisting in the toe box area. The arch support is there but the Velcro is a poor idea because it seems like it's in the wrong places to hold the feet in place and if you try to adjust it leaves areas of Velcro free which looks sloppy and cuts your feet like sandpaper. It's a shame because I really wanted to love these because I wanted something to wear with casual dresses that gave good support and I could walk in. They sit in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Causes feet to smell and not enough support
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brand for the first time. I wanted sandals instead of having to wear my shoes with ortho inserts for plantar fascitis. Had to go sockless for summer! The shoes have pretty good arch support and help with the plantar fascitis pain. Have minimal discomfort if any. The smell of these shoes is awful. And there is not enough side to side support because both my feet slide to the outer edge of the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: sharri

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Wore them all day. On the airplain. Comfortable. Would be easy to put on except I hurt my knee so I could not bend to put them on. My husband had to do it, he didn't seem to care that he had to do it at the airport. I wore flip flops on the way back. Shoes fit well, adjustable, and more comfortable than flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good Support for a Sandal
customer_reviews.text: For a sandal, this is a very supportive foot piece. Quite good arch support. I would not do a lot of walking in them, but they support my foot better than any other sandal I’ve worn. They make a nice, dressier look when I go out. Much better than my walking shoes designed for feet requiring lots of support.
customer_reviews.author: Bimbette

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe, very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 1/2 size larger, should have just stayed with my normal size, they run true to size. I wear an 8 1/2 and ordered a 9 to make sure of length. Should have just stayed with my true size. Love the shoes, very comfortable and would recommend to anyone with foot issues that need a supportive shoe and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cute summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: Shoe appears to run a little wide but does have adjustable straps for a more custom fit. Was slightly disappointed that the straps are not very soft and are hoping they will soften with wear. This is my first time to purchase this brand as I usually purchase Taos which are super soft and comfortable right out of the box. These look stylish, I love the cork look and the stones on the center strap dress them up a little, making them perfect to wear with skirts, cute summer dresses or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Selby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive but velcro straps fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I wear a half size and followed other reviews and ordered the lower whole size and I'm glad that I did. The sandal is big enough, in fact it runs wide but with the adjustable velcro, you can custom fit the shoe. It's been very helpful with my plantar fasciitis and it's not as 'orthopedic' looking as I had feared. I would recommend them. UPDATE: Not even 2 months old and already the velcro is detaching from the straps. I just finished sewing the velcro back onto the strap. I hope it holds.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rella

customer_reviews.title: Not sold on the brand
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are true to size. This is my second pair of Vionics. I don’t know if I like them. I have my high arch feet I find that my heel feels really low and the shoes make me feel like I might fall backwards. Strange but true. Just something to consider when you are trying them for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: dreamine

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Looks okay, but there is almost no tread on the bottoms. If there is any water on the sidewalk or asphalt you will slip. You can adjust the size with the Velcro across the top of your foot and the back also. The sandals look just okay. I was hoping they would look nicer especially for the price. I bought them for the arch and heel support, which seems also, just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Vionic strappy sandal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work. I need the arch support, bc I stand on my feet all day. Didn’t last as long as they should’ve IMO. But they were comfy
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Need support? This has it all.
customer_reviews.text: Vionic sandals give support for arches and overall foot. This model has the adjustable back strap which hugs the foot making it more secure. I have a narrow foot so all the adjustable straps make it fit my feet well.
customer_reviews.author: cabooklover

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my mom since she loves this brand and had them shipped directly to her. She messaged me super excited having received them and said they are beautiful. I'm happy for her and won't be telling her that they are the wrong shoe. I ordered her the black croc and she received the tan cork. Aside from the wrong color, she tells me they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Vaja Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar facitis need to wear shoes with arch support & back strap. I wear Vionic sandals & know that they say to size down. I normally wear a 10M but with Vionic sandals I purchase size 9 & they fit perfect. Arch support is not as good as other Vionic styles of sandals but it does have some. This style is no longer being made & am thankful to have found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mg2u08

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was not as happy with this shoe as the other Vionic. It was a little to big. The strap do lay flat. They are to long and can’t be tightened because you run out of Velcro. Rubs a little on the top of the foot. Straps broke on both shoes in one month. Not recommending these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Praising Jesus

customer_reviews.title: I love Vionic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with All my Vionic shoes/sandles. I bought these a few months ago and I love how they fit, they have velcro so I can adjust them and I stand in them all day! I am a hairstylist and I work alot. The only downside to this particular pair is that the sole is covered in some kind of suede and at first it can make them feel a little slippery, but if you tighten them a a little it makes them more secure. And now that I have worn off the fuzzy part they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a perfect fit for me. The arch support was just what a needed and since I am usually hard to fit, the adjustable straps let me adjust the fit to my needs. I bought them for a vacation trip.
customer_reviews.author: Flower lady

customer_reviews.title: Cute for church and comfortable for daily use
customer_reviews.text: As usual can’t beat these Sandler’s. I need the built in arch support and love the adjustable straps. Cute for church and comfortable for daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sandals that Run Large
customer_reviews.text: These sandals extended 3/4" beyond my big toe even though the size was my customary 7. I was disappointed, as the straps adjust to the peculiarities of my feet. (Wide at the ball, but very low at the instep, and flat) They could be a little softer for the super-sensitive bottoms of my feet, but I would have kept them if they didn't look goofy because of the size. I suspect a 6.5 would fit if they made one.
customer_reviews.author: fanciful99

customer_reviews.title: For wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Way too wide and when I pull the strap to fit my foot the straps are flapping over on the side and look awful . They do not look like in the photos . I am sure if you have wide feet these would be much better fiitting. I also feel they are longer than most . Vionic is a good supportive shoe but these are ugly on me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise J, Scrivner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Vionic sandal with adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.text: I own many Vionic shoes and these fit just like all my other sandals fit. Great arch support and adjustable straps to adjust the width of shoes. The cork color goes with everything and the little bling on the straps look great. I wear the wide width in all Vionic sandals and these were perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: great for elderly or those with ortho foot problems or edema
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 97 year old mother who still likes to look her best but has several medical issues with her feet and on and off edema. they are stylish yet adjustable for different degrees of swelling or thickness of socks. Price better and they are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: sueb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 74 year old mom who is developing problems with her feet due to normal daily wear and tear of joints. I was hesitant due to the cost but well worth it!! My mom can be on her feet all day with no pain! Highly recommend. Will be buying her sneakers soon.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Relief from multiple issues, finally!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, Love them, Love them. I have Plantar Faciaitis in both feet, heel spurs, Achilles Tendonitis in both feet, and prior surgery on Right foot, Severe spine damage/ can't stand or walk for no more than 20 minute intervals, knee joint deteroation and hip issues, osteoarthritis, DDD and Cervical Fusion issues. I am allergic to antiinflammatory meds. and steroids. Needless to say I have to grin and bare it. These shoes are a God send! fit well, very supportive but most importantly no pain anywhere when I have them on. I am walking more and for longer periods than I have in years. Thank you and God Bless you!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Love the adjustable straps
customer_reviews.text: I love most of my orthaheel shoes and sandals. This is the first pair I've tried that are not the "thong" type. My foot runs a little narrow and these are great! The adjustable straps make the fit perfect.. It's also nice to try a different kind of sandal. I wear only orthaheel sandals. Great arch support but the foot bed is softer than some other brands with solid arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable if you get the size right!
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist recommended I purchase Vionic shoes because of Plantar Faciitis and I’m so amazed at how perfect these feel. What a relief. I am usually a size 7.5 and purchased these in size 7 because I read they run large. A size 7 was too big! I tried to talk myself into keeping them because I didn’t want to return them but they hurt! They arch was all wrong. So I returned them for a size 6 and they fit perfectly! I have then in black and also gold cork. If they don’t feel right then you might have the wrong size. I put on the correct size and instantly knew it was right. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, so why the 3 stars? Because I've had them less than three months and the Velcro strip on both ankle straps became unstitched. I would hope that a $75 pair of shoes would last longer. Now I have to find a shoe place that can repair them, because I really do love these shoes. After wearing them every day, any heel pain I had was gone. I followed other reviews on Amazon and Vionic's website, and I agree with buying the next size down. I usually wear 8.5 or 9 but went with an 8 on these, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Manley

customer_reviews.title: first sandals I can wear without my arch supports!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I ordered them in the beige/gold color and will order the other colors soon. They fit well and are so supportive of my plantar fasciitis that I can wear as is without additional arch supports. First time in 4 years! They look cute too!
customer_reviews.author: V. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: I can adjust straps to fit shape of my feet - so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Vionic Women's sandal. I even bought a pair for my sister because both of us find it hard to find sandals that don't hurt some part of our feet. These are so wonderful, I can adjust each strap to give a special comfort fit
customer_reviews.author: Audrita

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I would like Vionics to come in narrow width. Because of the Velcro closings I am able to wear this style. Can’t wear most of vionic styles.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandals. I ordered gold cork and received black. I needed these for an event due to recent plantar fascia, so I kept the black. I would have given 5 stars if the color was right.
customer_reviews.author: djoy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out for me
customer_reviews.text: The straps going across the foot hurt, no matter how i adjusted them, they were digging into my foot. Also, the back strap came right under my ankle bone and that was also painful. I was so excited to get these, then so disappointed when they did not work. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with great support
customer_reviews.text: Cute sandal with great support. Works as a casual or dressy sandal. Perfect if you suffer with plantar fasciitis, will use these when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Knew Sandals Could Have Such Superior Arch Support!
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist suggested these sandals and he was right. I have problem feet (flat, bunions) usually require custom orthotics and shoes that have to be stretched. I have long envied other women who could wear nice sandals with their dresses. But envy them no more: not only can I wear dresses again with nice shoes, but I will be able to actually take those "sunset walks" pain-free!
customer_reviews.author: SILance

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Arch support is key for me since I have congenitally flat feet and have developed tendon problems as a result. I wear New Balance running shoes with custom orthotics 99% of the time. Vionic sandals are among the very few commercially available fashion shoes I can wear comfortably for any length of time. This particular pair has the added advantage of being fully adjustable and they are SO attractive that I bought two pair in different colors. They are dressy enough to wear out for dinner and casual enough to wear with shorts or capris.
customer_reviews.author: Puppymom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and classy sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals with great support. Can be on my feet for hours and they look very dressy too. I normally have to wear orthodic support in my shoes or my feet will hurt. First bought Orthaheel brand several years ago and they were the first sandals I could wear without pain. They are now called Vionic.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and a neuroma. Normally I have to use custom orthotics but I can wear these sandals. I have them in three colors. My foot is also narrow so it’s hard to find shoes that don’t slip but with these all the straps are adjustable. I bought my first pair about three years, have worn them a lot and they still look great. I normally wear a 7 1/2 in shoes and an 8 in tennis shoes but a 7 fits perfectly in these sandals. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very comfortable. They have good support for the arches. It feel very good on my feet. I like the multiple straples for fitting. Right now my right foot is slightly swollen. Each foot feets great for they are individually adjusted. I would buy they again when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable but straps are too long
customer_reviews.text: Most vionic shoes are very comfortable. Specially having to do with arch support which my feet desperately need. These shoes have excellent arch support but the straps are too long and the shoe runs a little too big on my foot. I'm a 6 in sandals but somehow vionic shoes fit me a little too large on a 6.
customer_reviews.author: PILARCITA

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot with plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: After having several pairs of these myself, I bought these for my daughter who was having a lot of pain from plantar fasciitis. Although these sandals haven't totally healed it, they helped tremendously. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Width of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I received a really wide shoe. I did not see anywhere on the site to state the width I wanted, so got what I didn't want. However, the shoe was uncomfortable anyway, so I probably would have returned it even if I gotten the width I wanted. I have had a vionic shoe sandal before which I LOVED, but I don't believe it's availale any more.
customer_reviews.author: mrsb

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Pair of Orthaheel/Vionic
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Florida girl, so I bought these to wear with black socks on my trips to the cold northern states this winter. All I can say is that they felt great and didn't even look that bad (my kids laughed when I pointed out to them what I was wearing, but note that I had to point it out to them!!). Now that I am back south, I can adjust the straps so I can wear them au natural. I wear only Orthaheel/Vionic shoes and slippers (plantar fasciitis and high arches).
customer_reviews.author: Midumamama

customer_reviews.title: High Arch
customer_reviews.text: Sandals are very nice-looking. I have very high arch feet and need good support to avoid plantar faciitis pain. These shoes have high-arch support, which is perfect for me. The sandals are a bit wider than my feet but still look nice and feel comfortable. Disclaimer: My feet are skinny, so, they may fit just fine on regular feet.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable straps; great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Nice that the straps are adjustable. I had swelling in my foot following an injury and I was able to modify the straps to accommodate the reduced swelling. They are very attractive sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & support, also pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! All the straps are adjustable so you can get a perfect fit. The foot support is great, I have a history of plantar fasciitis and my podiatrist recommended this brand. The black sandals are pretty as well, so easy to wear with dresses, nicer summer outfits, etc. I would definitely recommend these. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy Beach Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom and she absolutely loves them! She says that they're the most comfortable sandals she has ever owned. They look really cute on her - perfect for the summer with a casual skirt/dress, pants, shorts, or capris.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Love them !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort , my feet dont hurt while wearing them !! Can feel big differance from when i wear flats !!! I recomend
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these same sandals twice before purchasing this pair. The Vionic brand has very comfortable sandals with great arch support. This model has adjustable straps which I love. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals. I have problematic feet and these help so much. The heel sits a little lower which helps my posture. The whole soul is soft and gushy, which I love. I hope the velcro holds up and the straps. I'm not sure what the strap material is. They were a little pricey, but worth it to me if they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sandal style I’ve purchased. I have it in multiple colors because it’s the only sandal that not only supports my arches but is fully adjustable to the shape of my feet as every strap has Velcro closures. The style is very fashionable and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these Vionic's at Macy's several years ago and just would't give them up even though they were slowly falling apart after so much wear. Plus I didn't want to pay the higher price to replace them. Saw them on Amazon, thought I would take a chance. Matched down to the numbers on the bands. Perfect fit! Threw the old ones out, have my new ones and feet are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Quisenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: Vionics are the best. I have flat feet and the arch is amazing. Takes away foot pain. Beautifully made. You can adjust these for a perfect fit with the velcroed straps. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: VJR

customer_reviews.title: Wife has a hammertoe and the pressure against strap is evidently too much since other straps work fine. Concerned about durabili
customer_reviews.text: Bottom strap does not stay closed on right sandal. Could use longer bottom strap and with more velcro. Wife has a hammertoe and the pressure against strap is evidently too much since other straps work fine. Concerned about durability of sandal though. Doesn't seem as durable as other Vionic sandals purchased in past. Just had bottom strap sewn shut,not noticeable and sandal is fine now. Will report back on how the sandal holds up.
customer_reviews.author: jaz

customer_reviews.title: Great design and comfort for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I am a corporate trainer and find and I'm on my feet 8 hours a day and for 2-3 times a week. I'm usually standing on concrete covered with carpet so I feel I need the support and cushion to survive the day. These sandals are so comfortable and have saved my feet from a lot of pain and fatigue. I have 3 pairs of these sandals in different colors and have purchased a pair of Vionicheel slippers. They give great support for flat feet as well as cushion for your heels. I'm a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Cipriani

customer_reviews.title: Sides came unglued..
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed . The side straps of the sandal came unglued and now my foot is not secure. Wore them a few times and the sides separated. Have worn this type of sandal for number of years and this is the first time this has happened. Wore for less than 3 weeks. Trying to get replacement or refund . Very surprised since they are Vionic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have vionic “flip flop”style sandals that I love. These are a work appropriate style, and fit just as well as my others. I have a wide foot, and with the 4 strap adjustability, I can customize them to exactly what I need. I ordered the wide size, which is very hard to find in stores. I loved them so much, I ordered the other color!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C Ickes

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: My foot is very small but a little wide. Women's size 5 are often just a little too narrow for me, so I frequently purchase children's size 3 or 3 1/2, they fit slightly wider. These Vionics in size 5 fit me perfectly and are very comfortable. This is actually the second pair of this shoe that I've purchased because I've been so happy with them. I will admit that I'm replacing them because the velcro on the right ankle strap fell apart after about 6 months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: write again

product_meta.title: Vionic Women's Amber
product_meta.description: Women's Vionic by Orthaheel, Amber Sandal. Step out in all day in comfort with the Amber Sandal. This pretty sandal also offers total support and is clinically shown to help relieve common causes of plantar fasciitis, heel pain and knee pain due to over-pronation and flat feet. Leather uppers with decorative ornament accents for added style 4 Adjustable hook and loop closure straps for a customized fit Tri planar technology, couples a biomechanical orthotic footbed with a high Arch and deep heel cup to help realign the feet back to its natural position EVA midsole with a flexible rubber traction outsole. Heel Height of 1.50 inches
feature_bullets: Leather uppers with decorative ornament accents for added style
4 Adjustable hook and loop closure straps for a customized fit
Tri planar technology, couples a biomechanical orthotic footbed with a high
Arch and deep heel cup to help realign the feet back to its natural position
EVA midsole with a flexible rubber traction outsole
